name: Entrenched
storyline:
This First person shooter is set in a world where WW1 surpassed 1918, as we begin to enter the technologies of the 1920's and beyond.

Expanding on battlefield arenas never ventured for a WW1 game, we intend to open the creative doors to tell a story that breaks the boundary of what you would typically expect in a WW1 set game.
summary: Entrenched is a Mulitplayer FPS World War 1 inspired arena shooter where you play in many warzones.
